io.github.processthis.springserver.model.dao

Interface SketchRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Sketch,UUID>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Sketch,UUID>

    public interface SketchRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Sketch,UUID>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String FEATURED_QUERY
      This field creates an SQL query that finds all sketches that have likes and orders them in order of the most likes it uses an inner join on the results of a nested query to accomplish this magic

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Sketch> findAllByNameContainingOrderByNameAsc(String fragment)
      This method is used to search for all sketches whose name contains a given fragment
      List<Sketch> getAllByOrderByNameAsc()
      This method gets a list of all sketches ordered by name
      List<Sketch> getAllByUserProfile(UserProfile userProfile)
      This method gets a list of all sketches created a by a given user profile
      List<Sketch> getMostLikedSketches(int count)
      This method ses the SQL constant defined above to return a list of sketches ordered by the most likes
      List<Sketch> getTop10ByOrderByCreatedDesc()
      This method returns a list of the last ten sketches created

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, findAll, findAllById, findById, save, saveAll

    • Field Detail

      • FEATURED_QUERY

        static final String FEATURED_QUERY
        This field creates an SQL query that finds all sketches that have likes and orders them in order of the most likes it uses an inner join on the results of a nested query to accomplish this magic
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

        This method gets a list of all sketches ordered by name

        List<Sketch> findAllByNameContainingOrderByNameAsc(String fragment)

        Parameters:

      • getTop10ByOrderByCreatedDesc

        List<Sketch> getTop10ByOrderByCreatedDesc()
        This method returns a list of the last ten sketches created

      • getMostLikedSketches

        @Query(value="SELECT S.* FROM SKETCH AS S INNER JOIN ( SELECT s_aggr.* FROM (    SELECT SKETCH.SKETCH_ID, count(*) AS count FROM SKETCH INNER JOIN LIKES ON LIKES.SKETCH_ID = SKETCH.SKETCH_ID GROUP BY SKETCH.SKETCH_ID ) AS s_aggr ORDER BY s_aggr.count DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH next :count ROWS ONLY ) AS s_rank ON s_rank.SKETCH_ID = S.SKETCH_ID ",
       nativeQuery=true)
List<Sketch> getMostLikedSketches(int count)
        This method ses the SQL constant defined above to return a list of sketches ordered by the most likes
        Parameters:
        count - the number of sketches to return
